name: Sputnik Bros: A call from the space
name_original: Sputnik Bros: A call from the space
description:
In Sputnik Bros, you'll control two brothers joined by a cable, Sput and Nick. The game's goal is to take Sput to the exit door.

Controls:



Game made by Aitor López, Ivan Ramos and Xabier Goenaga for the  Cowboy's 100 Dollar Game Jam.

Used assets:

  • FFF Forward Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/fff-forward-font.html
  • Karmatic Arcade: https://www.1001fonts.com/karmatic-arcade-font.html
